file.name: webapp.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.2
info:
  title: eidos
  version: v1
servers:
  - url: 'http://localhost:9000'
    description: Localhost

components:
  schemas:
    regroundRequest:
      type: object
      required:
      - ontologyYaml
      - texts
      properties:
        name:
          type: string
          default: "Custom"
        ontologyYaml:
          type: string
        texts:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
        filter:
          type: boolean
          default: true
        topk:
          type: integer
          format: int32
          default: 10
        isAlreadyCanonicalized:
          type: boolean
          default: true
          
    regroundResponse:
      type: array
      items:
        type: array
        items:
          type: object
          properties:
            grounding:
              type: string
            score:
              type: number
            
paths:
  /reground:
    post:
      summary: Reground using yaml ontology and options provided
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/regroundRequest'
      responses:
        200:
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/regroundResponse"
